Name: Octodrachm of Ptolemy II
Description: Octodrachm of Ptolemy II. Anverse: bust of Ptolemy II with mantle and diadem, placed on top of the bust of Arsinoe II with veil and diadem. Above ADELPHON, behind them, a  shield. Reverse: head of Ptolemy I with diadem and aegis and Berenice with veil and diadem. Above CEON.
